text: When dictators want to cash in: <http://kotaku.com/former-dictator-manuel-noriega-is-suing-over-call-of-du-1605845201>

attachments.title: Former Dictator Manuel Noriega Is Suing Over Call of Duty
attachments.text: Former Panamanian dictator Manuel Noriega is taking Activision to court over his depiction in Call of Duty: Black Ops II.

text: Also: may not pertain to only games, but an interesting change of policy. <http://www.theverge.com/2014/7/18/5915415/google-adding-in-app-purchase-protections-european-commission>

attachments.title: Google will stop calling games 'free' when they offer in-app purchases
attachments.text: Google has agreed to add protections around games' in-app purchases to ensure that children won't rack up unwanted charges on their parents' credit cards. The changes come at the request of the...
